definition: to make/to build/to manufacture/to invent/to fabricate/to go to/party (in a lawsuit or legal agreement)/crop/classifier for crops
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb

sentences.english: Foreland basins are the key areas for the study of orogeny.
sentences.chinese: 前陆盆地是研究造山运动的关键地区之一。

sentences.english: A type granitoids are the indicator of the end of orogenesis.
sentences.chinese: 型花岗岩的发育是造山运动结束的标志。

sentences.english: The period was one of general emergence and orogeny .
sentences.chinese: 这个时期是全面的上升和造山运动。

definition: fourth period/quaternary (geological period covering the recent ice ages over the last 180,000 years)
Paleozoic, geological era 545-250m years ago, covering Cambrian 寒武紀|寒武纪, Ordovician 奧陶紀|奥陶纪, Silurian 志留紀|志留纪, Devonian 泥盆紀|泥盆纪, Carboniferous 石炭紀|石炭纪, Permian 二疊紀|二叠纪
third period/tertiary (geological era since the extinction of the dinosaurs at the Cretaceous-Tertiary boundary 65 million years ago)
pre-Cambrian, geological period before c. 540m years ago
variant of 岩層|岩层[yan2 ceng2]/rock strata
Sinian (c. 800-542 million years ago), late phase of pre-Cambrian geological era
